title: Geoffrey Howe dead: Watch the former Chancellor’s historic resignation speech that sparked the downfall of Thatcher
text: The former Chancellor of the Exchequer , Sir Geoffrey Howe has died aged 88. Although he served senior ministerial roles in the Conservative governments of both Edward Heath and Margaret Thatcher , arguably it is his resignation speech for
